name: Wunderbar
description:
This was an attempt to simulate a drinking experience anywhere you are in the palm of your hand. There is no challenge involved, you can simply take a sip by tapping or just chug through your beer if you press and hold. A UI in the HUD fills up as you keep drinking, it slowly reduces after you stop. It is supposed to indicate a level of intoxication but it currently does nothing even if it fills up.

I currently have no solid plans to build a game around this but that would be exciting at some point.

Design: Varun Raj K
